I am very particular when it comes to hotels and this is at the top of my list for Orlando. I would definitely recommend it and stay again. It has very nice bathrooms with Neutrogena products and marble countertops. Laundry room on each floor for convenience. Free coffee/tea in the lobby each morning. Also has a restaurant with great breakfast and kids eat free. Has a nice size pool as well as a kiddie pool. Free parking. I believe they also have shuttle service but you'd have to ask to confirm. Free in-room wifi.

Reviews.Title: “Convenient, clean, great service and nice amenities.”
Reviews.Author: gruvtrtl2
Reviews.Content: We chose this hotel because of its proximity to Seaworld. We were able to walk to the park in about 10 minutes. The front desk personnel were always friendly and helpful. The room is clean, well furnished and updated. Amenities included coffee maker, minifridge and microwave. We received rollaway beds for both of our rooms and weren't charged an extra fee (though they told us there would be a fee when we requested them.) The pool area was nice and the hot tub was comfortable. The bar service was quick. We ordered food from the restaurant via the bar and were able to enjoy it by the pool. We got one room at $44 through Hotwire and another at $120 via a AAA rate. I highly recommend this hotel and would stay here again without question.

Reviews.Title: “Awesome hotel, but hotel needs to invest in comfy queen beds”
Reviews.Author: rockyfl
Reviews.Content: Premier hotel for anybody going to Orlando and needing a central location. Sea World is literally behind the hotel. Hotel can be seen from many locations within the park. Parking is adequate and well lit. Pool is relaxing as well as the hot tub. Housekeeping could use a few pointers on friendliness. Maintenance is very friendly even though I did not have any issues. Restaurant is excellent for breakfast. Rooms are up to date, but the owners need to invest in queen beds. Current beds are not very comfy, and are unusual size for a Hilton Garden Inn. Also, the 25 inch box tv could be replaced with a modern flat screen. In closing, if the owners invested in beds, this would be the best value in Orlando for business or pleasure.

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel with good price”
Reviews.Author: FarAwayHome
Reviews.Content: We enjoyed our stay at this hotel. The location is extremely close to Sea World and Aquatica. The distance from Disney and Universal is just right that it wasn't inconvenient and cost of the room was enough to offset the 15 minute ride to those parks. On the surface the room appears clean. The only reason I doubt is because my son's allergies was worse (usual stuffy nose and itchy rash on face, which is unusual) inside the room. He was much better when we returned home. I am not too sure if the cause was an unclean room. The staff was very helpful, especially when I needed to find a 24 hour pharmacy to fill a prescription for my son. For the price and location, I would book this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect room for family with small children”
Reviews.Author: matischer
Reviews.Content: Our family had a very nice stay at the Hilton Garden Inn Seaworld in Mid-March 2009. The front desk made checking in easy, even getting a crib up to our room before we got there. We were on the top floor looking at seaworld so that was cool for the kids to see. The beds were very comfortable, a foam matress so there was absolutely no squeeking for sleep-movers. The space in the room was very comfortable, and we never turned the tv on once. The mini-pantry set up was convienance to stash snacks and juices away and the bathroom was very roomy. We checked into our room late and realized that the carpet had torn away from the bathroom door's threshhold and wanted that fixed in the morning. The next day maintenance said they would check on it while we were out, and when we came back that night, they told us they needed to just move us to a new room to fix the carpet. This was a bit inconvienant, but they gave us coupons for a free breakfasts and a beautiful fruit basket. totally ok with our family. Our new room was right outside of the elevator and i was worried it would be noisy but i never heard anything. We had to use the washer/dryer one night too and it was easy and fast. ($2/wash, $2/dry) It is an easy off/on to I-4, very easy to get to disneyworld and we found a great side road that got us right to universal (and past a wal-mart for incidentals!). Being a walk away from seaworld was super convienant too. I ended up leaving seaworld with our toddler about 30 minutes before my spouse and that was ok because it was just a walk back, and the child could just keep napping in the stroller, i didn't have to move him into a car seat or anything. We never had a hard time finding a parking space at the hotel and the hotel was very clean. Their breakfast was top notch, well worth the $10 BUT i would have liked it to be complimentary too. We were there to visit the theme parks, and were always exhausted when we got back. This was the perfect hotel for just that-resting! We got an awesome rate of $42/night from hotwire and were extremely pleased with our stay. They treated us like we spent $142. We would definately consider this hotel for a stay again.

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic location, nice stay.”
Reviews.Author: MinnVacationer
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel through Priceline and got a great deal. They allowed a very early check in and SeaWorld is behind the hotel. It took 15 minutes to walk to SeaWorld.g. Nice staff and clean, comfortable rooms. I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel, great location!”
Reviews.Author: starvinmarvin
Reviews.Content: Hotel was clean, pretty new, and and had everything we wanted. It was right across the street from Sea World (7 minute walk) which was our main destination. The staff was friendly and helpful. The room was larger than most we have stayed in. The breakfast was good, but a little pricey ($10). There weren't many dining options nearby. Overall, it was a great value for the quality of the hotel and we will stay here again next year.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel...more for business!”
Reviews.Author: LegoJoe
Reviews.Content: My husband stays here monthly for work, and it's a great business hotel. We stayed for leisure this time, because of the affordability and access to attractions. Check-In: Very uneventful...staff nice. Rooms: The rooms for the Orlando area are very nice. I have noticed that many hotels are very outdated in Orlando, and this hotel is not. It's very up to date. Showers and bathrooms are very clean. Beds are very comfortable. Pool: The pool is a little small for Orlando hotels, but adequate. The staff seemed to keep it very clean. Restaurant: Good. We stayed for breakfast each day, and it's a buffett; omelets, waffles, etc. A little pricey...but not too bad for the Orlando area. Staff was very attentive. All in all, we really like this hotel for it's cleanliness, up to date amenities and access to restaurants and attractions. Please let me know if you have any additional questions and I'd be more than happy to answer them.

Reviews.Title: “A great way to enjoy Sea World!”
Reviews.Author: ExplorerAP
Reviews.Content: At first, it seemed a bit awkward to find, but then we parked our car, checked in, and walked to Sea World! How great is that? It was perfect for taking a break during the day to rest up for the evening events at Sea World. We bought the “one day ticket that you can use all year” (Fun Card) so we visited the park several times through December, and my favorite visits included staying at this hotel. Helpful, friendly staff, clean cozy rooms including the most comfortable bed I’ve encountered in a hotel, on-site cafe and convenience shop=wonderful stay!

Reviews.Title: “No Surprises”
Reviews.Author: MrCKramer
Reviews.Content: Clean Open WiFi service Good Pool & Spa Good TV

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel and great service”
Reviews.Author: kimalli1
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect hotel if the purpose of your trip is a visit to SeaWorld. Seaworld is literally right behind the hotel. Of course, it would be just as good for just about anything! Our room was spotlessly clean and it was a great benefit to have a refrigerator and microwave in the room. We got an EXCELLENT deal through hotwire. We have paid more in Orlando for a room where we ended up putting a chair against the door at night! The staff was very friendly and helpful. When we got home my husband found that he had forgotten a pair of jeans. The staff was quick to return his message and confirm that they had found them and would ship them right back to him at no charge. They also helped to recommend a restaurant that was just what we were looking for. We definitely would recommend this hotel for anybody looking for a hotel in Orlando.

Reviews.Title: “One of the Best!”
Reviews.Author: lcwl
Reviews.Content: This is one of the best hotels we've ever stayed at! The location was great, room was above-average, and the hotel in general was exceptional. We had a room with a view of SeaWorld and saw fireworks every night of our stay. We had the option of including a breakfast buffet each morning and we were not disappointed. Very nice hotel and made for a great family vacation.

Reviews.Title: “walk to seaworld!”
Reviews.Author: charliecatsmail
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for New Year and beat the traffic by walking across the road. Rooms comfortable but pricey for what you get. Staff argued in front of customers in dining room. Wanted a view of Seaworld to see the evening fireworks but suites are all located on other side of hotel. Pool and gym tiny for size of hotel.

Reviews.Title: “served its purpose”
Reviews.Author: loves2travel1
Reviews.Content: Family of 4 stayed here for disney trip. Room was fine. Price was amazing. Special thru expedia $39/night plus $50 off for booking 3+ nights. Housekeeping came really late-usually when we were coming back from the park for a rest so room did not get cleaned several days in a row. Other than that, no complaints. Room was clean and bed comfy which are my main priorities. When we go to Disney, usually just sleep in room and spend rest of the time in the parks so don't need fancy. Cannot comment on room service, restaurant, bar or pool. all looked adequate but nothing special. Not a lot of food close by but not a huge problem, as we had a car. Room had frig & microwave which is always great with small kids.

Reviews.Title: “Great value”
Reviews.Author: pinesdriver
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for one night on a househunting trip to Orlando. Got a great price on Priceline. Room was clean and quiet and it is in a convenient location adjacent to Sea World and an easy drive to the other parks and I-Drive. It was a great value for the price and we would definitely consider a return stay or recommend others do so.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value”
Reviews.Author: sweetchic123
Reviews.Content: We've just stayed here for 8 nights, for the price we pad ($44/night), can not fault this for value. Good points:- Close to seaworld lynx and I - trolley stops right outside hotel nice but small pool and hot tub cheap comfy beds nice size rooms with fridges and coffe maker on the whole, friendly staff free internet access in rooms with own comp, or free on hotels computers in the "business centre" - ( a room with 2 pc's in it!) Bad points:- nowhere within walking distance to eat beds were a bit small our key cards stopped working a few times and had to get new ones - staff couldn't explain why! As you will see, we were overall very happy and would stay there again. We would probably prefer to have a car though wheras it is easier to do without one on other more central locations on i drive.

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay!”
Reviews.Author: iloveitloud71m
Reviews.Content: Instead of the Crowne Plaza , My wife and I stayed 3 nights. Great location , great breakfast , clean room , comfy bed . One minor glitch , needs more parking. Friendly front desk , good maid service , would definitely stay again & recommend to all . Hard to pick from over 300+ hotels in Orlando , good , safe pick here , a good 3 star property at a great deal!

Reviews.Title: “Convenient to SeaWorld”
Reviews.Author: golferperry
Reviews.Content: My family and I stayed at the Hilton Garden SeaWorld for three nights. As advertised, it is very close to SeaWorld. You can walk to SeaWorld if you want to, but with the temperatures in the high 90's and the threat of afternoon thunderstorms, we decided to drive to SeaWorld. However, the hotel's close location made it easy to go back and forth from SeaWorld to the hotel to take a break from the crowds and the heat. The room was typical Hilton Garden and was OK. The front desk staff were very nice and the restaurant staff were nice as well, although sometimes there did not seem to be enough staff in the restaurant. The hotel was very crowded, as would be expected. My one complaint which is not entirely the hotel's fault was the noise levels in the rooms. We could hear the family (and baby) next to us, and we could hear families coming and going down the hallways. We were awakened one morning before 7:00 AM by a family yelling to each other down the hall and talking on their cell phones. Maybe they could sound-proof the rooms more. As others have written, there are no other restaurants within walking distance; however, there were several within a mile of the hotel on International Avenue. Overall, I'd consider staying at this hotel again if I were going to SeaWorld. If I had to give it a grade I'd give it a B or a B+.

Reviews.Title: “Go over your bill”
Reviews.Author: peacock2185
Reviews.Content: My husband and I spent 6 days here in Orlando on vacation. The hotel met our needs, we were rarely in the room except to sleep. The beds are not really that comfortable. Mid-stay the front desk called our room to confirm we were still there. Someone had checked out and given our room#. We thought nothing else of it until 4 weeks later when we received our credit card bill. We were charged 2(we were given 1 bill when leaving) separate times showing we had checked out then checked back in. One of the charges was only for 2 days, but was high enough to have been 2 nights at the Ritz Carlton! I had to call and get them to take the charges off! Overall the stay was okay, but go over your bill at the front when you leave! One more thing, the shuttle to the theme parks were so run down, but it was nice to not have to drive to Universal.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel, good value”
Reviews.Author: NashuaNH
Reviews.Content: We stayed here for a week while I was attending a conference at a nearby hotel. The rate of $105 included buffet breakfast, which was an excellent rate for the area. Our room was on the top floor, very quiet, fridge, microwave, comfortable bed, plenty of room. The staff were all so pleasant and check in was quick. Toher reviewers are right that there is nothing within walking distance except SeaWorld, but there are shuttles/trolleys all the time. It is also very quiet, no night life and I really didnt find that a problem. There are plenty of places to go for that in Orlando. The pool was really nice, but almost all of the lounge chairs had broken webbing, which I found kind of odd. All in all, I would stay here again, it was a very relaxing stay.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Price - Excellent Hotel.”
Reviews.Author: Corry8
Reviews.Content: My family thoroughly enjoyed our 5 night stay here. The room was roomy and spotless, beds pretty comfy and shower nice and powerful. Staff were polite and helpful. Pool area clean with some shaded areas and pool towels were provided. Room was cleaned, beds made and fresh towels were given everyday. Shampoo and shower gel was replenished if required. Linen was changed on our 4th day. Fresh tea and coffee were provided each morning in reception which was a nice touch and in-room wireless internet provided free of charge. Area around hotel nice and quiet with good access to major roads and I-Drive Trolley. Though we didn't use it, I noticed that they provided free coach travel to the parks and there were lots of different departure times. Seaworld was just a five minute walk away. If it had a fault it would be that the beds were not queen size, just your normal double. If this doesn't bother you and you get a good price then book this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Just ok”
Reviews.Author: cabes2
Reviews.Content: I stayed here for three nights as part of a time share promotion. The rooms were very clean, but the decor was a bit dated. Also, the pools were overcrowded. The time share guy was nasty and kept us there for longer than promised. My young son was acting up so we had to leave. It was a relief to get out there. This hotel is just ok.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel”
Reviews.Author: Snoopy107
Reviews.Content: Me and my family stayed here in April 08 and loved evey minute. Rooms very clean and spacious, staff very friendly, helpful and welcoming. Breakfast was lovely. Dinner not too great but we ate out mosts nights anyway. Pool more than adequate for the size of hotel. We have stayed in both The Rosen Plaza and The Renaissance and found this to be a far better hotel than either of the other two. Yes its smaller and doesn't have the "wow" factor that the other 2 have but I would def stay here again where I wouldn't at the other two.

Reviews.Title: “I'd stay there again”
Reviews.Author: nytraveler78
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel due to its proximity to Seaworld. It was an easy walk to the park. They also have a free shuttle to Universal and EPCOT. The room was clean and the bed was very comfortable. I had to drag myself out of bed each morning lured only by the attractions I wanted to see! The pool area was small, but adequate. I only wish the hot tub was a little bigger. There is a nice little restaurant in the hotel that serves a nice buffet breakfast, and a varied dinner menu for reasonable prices. This is a plus as there are no other restaurants within walking distance which is honestly the only real complaint I have. The desk staff was very kind and accomodating. They were very apologetic that my room was not ready when I arrived to check in even though I arrived 2 hours early. They really did not owe me any apologies. They will let you store your luggage behind the desk if you are early for check in or if you need a place to keep it after you check out. I have stayed both at this Hilton Garden Inn and the Hilton Garden on International Drive, and would recommend both for those who desire a decent no frills hotel for a reasonable price.

Reviews.Title: “Doorway to Seaworld”
Reviews.Author: SeacatF47
Reviews.Content: After a long haul flight from England found check in at the hotel very fast and efficient. Room was reasonably sized, very clean, well furnished and comfortable. Good view from the window with no noise, air con was quiet and enoyed a good nights sleep in a queen sized bed. Buffet breakfast was well laid out and enjoyable - no complaints! Sea World is a short 5min walk across the car park, Disney parks and Universal are all within 15mins drive at any time of day - all in all a central location away from the main I drive area which I feel has become run down over recent years. Would recommend for all age groups and families - pool is not massive but is sufficient to keep the kids happy - also doesn't bust the bank! Would I go there again - absolutely - clean, comfortable, central, reasonable rates - what more do you want!

Reviews.Title: “Average”
Reviews.Author: lonaldp78
Reviews.Content: I stayed here during a recent business trip and wasn't wowed by anything they had to offer. The gym at the facility was about the size of a 6x6 space, the food was ok, but nothing to write home about. All in all an ok experience. Obviously the big selling point for anyone headed down was the fact that it's right off the highway, so a trip to Disney or Sea World would only take a matter of a couple of minutes.

Reviews.Title: “Superb, loved the stay!”
Reviews.Author: bram78
Reviews.Content: We booked this hotel quite last minute as the one we had previously booked had some vey bad reviews on tripadvisor. This place was perfect for us, if you have a car. You can walk to sea world in 5 minutes to the entrance and the hotel is hilton standard - everything is clean, tidy and the staff are helpful and friendly. The room was a good size also and was very comfortable. Althought the pool is a little small it was big enough for when we were there. At night we could sneak down to the lobby and get snacks from the mini mart there which was very handy for those midnight feasts. Some people do tend to put a pros and cons to their stays but to be honest i cant think of any "cons" so Im giving this hotel a 5 star. As said the location is perfect and you are only a few hundred yards from I4 so good for getting to other locations.

Reviews.Title: “Great Deal”
Reviews.Author: AGenua
Reviews.Content: We stayed at the Hilton for 3 nights. Check in was a breeze and the staff was very friendly and helpful. We only ate breakfast at the hotel and it was a buffet and for the price it was great. We were very happy. The room was wonderful and clean and we loved having a fridge and microwave. In the evenings there were fresh baked cookies at the front desk. Wonderful. We also loved the fact that we could walk to SeaWorld! We had a view of Kraken from our room! Our stay also included a $10 gas card which right now is wonderful. A wonderful stay for sure.

Reviews.Title: “Nice Stay!!!”
Reviews.Author: Hank007
Reviews.Content: My family and I spent four nights at the Hilton during the last week December. Check in was easy. Our room was clean and the hotel was very quiet. We enjoyed the quiet part, but we also appreciated the room in which to move around. Parking was never an issue. The hotel is in the middle of everything on International Drive. Close to shopping, restaurants, Universal Studios and I-4. Overall a great stay. Would definitely stay there again.

Reviews.Title: “One of the best stays in Orlando ever”
Reviews.Author: Slava_Atlanta_GA
Reviews.Content: Check-in: the hotel was ready for our late arrival with keys in the packet. They honored our request for a quiet room room on the highest possible floor. I just showed ID, signed, and got the keys. The whole procedure took 15 seconds. Room: room in excellent condition, very clean everything was working. Check-out: pressed a special button on the room phone, got confirmation and left keys on the desk. How easy, fast and efficent! Highlights: - fridge in the room - free highspeed internet by both LAN or wireless. I used it for my laptop (wired) and my kids for their iPods (wireless). - for a small fee added to the room price we got good breakfast for family of four. In Orlando there is number of good hotels but we've just found ours. We'll be back.

Reviews.Title: “OK but could have been better”
Reviews.Author: Frenchie
Reviews.Content: We stayed at this hotel for 3 nights. Overall the room was clean and it was handy having free internet access (business centre). Fairly good location (if you have a car) as you are within easy driving distance to the I-drive restaurants etc. Hotel offers a free shuttle to Universal / SeaWorld and although it arrived promptly in the morning, when we left Universal and arrived at 5:40pm for the scheduled 6pm pickup, the bus NEVER came! We had to wait until the 7:30pm pickup. When we mentioned this to the front desk, they were very apologetic, but I ran into another couple who told me this happened to them the day before when they went to SeaWorld (which by the way is walking distance from the hotel). The convenience of the shuttle allows you to avoid paying for parking and it drops you close to the front gates. Given the # of hotels in the area, I would think the hotel could have included a continental breakfast. Room included a mini-fridge and a microwave which was a bonus. Bed was very comfortable. Pool was much smaller than it appears in the pictures. There is construction going on (something on the main floor), and we awoke to the sound of "drilling" very early in the morning 6:00am (?) even though we were on one of the higher floors, but it was not to be heard over the weekend. Overall stay was OK, and I would consider staying here again.

Reviews.Title: “Very Convenient to SeaWorld”
Reviews.Author: DJHeileman
Reviews.Content: It's an okay place to stay. Pretty typical. I just wish they had a place to hang jackets, purses, and other items. And enough room in the bathroom to put all of our bags for toiletries out. I also wish that all hotels had a "lending closet" for items purchased but left behind by other guests. We bought beach chairs and had to leave them behind. I would have liked to know that other guests would get use from them also.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay”
Reviews.Author: Northeast07
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel for two nights in October while in Orlando on business. It is similar to other Hilton Garden Inn's in other areas of the country. Hotel is clean and well maintained. The room was comfortable, very spacious and relaxing. Staff was very courteous at check in, and whenever I walked by the front desk they eagerly asked how I was doing. There is a restaurant and a bar in the lobby, with the bar located next to the outdoor pool. I ordered room service for dinner and experienced a huge burger that was just perfect since I had arrived at the hotel late in the evening. Service was on time and complete...very convenient. A shuttle stop for the Orange County Convention Center is located in front of the hotel. This hotel seems to be geared more towards the business traveler, however, a couple doing the Orlando thing shouldn't pass up a competetive rate a this property. I will definitely stay there again while on business in the area and continue to have positive experiences with the Hilton name.

Reviews.Title: “What a deal!”
Reviews.Author: KayTee78
Reviews.Content: We stayed for 2 nights in mid-October. You can't beat the proximity to Sea World and Discovery Cove. If you have a car, it's also quite close to the I-4 exits for Disney World, Universal Studios, etc. The beds are comfortable, the bedding is updated, and the bathrooms are nice with granite countertops. The fridge and microwave were also a bonus. The a/c was a bit loud as others have said, and we did hear our neighbors clearly a few times, but that's a hotel for you. The staff was very nice and helped us change our room from 2 double beds to 1 king. We got room service one night and the food was good. Can't beat the price we paid, $99 a night. We will definitely stay again!

Reviews.Title: “Great stay!”
Reviews.Author: RufusKy
Reviews.Content: Directly across parking lot from SeaWorld Orlando. Very clean, great staff, they were helpful with directions in Orlando and restaurant recommendations. Highly Recommend. Only drawback.....no continental breakfast, only $10.95 buffet.

Reviews.Title: “Great location, great service, great room, great breakfast!”
Reviews.Author: cruiselyn
Reviews.Content: We arrived early before check in time but they let us check in anyway, very accomodating! The room was a good size, 2 double beds, had MW and refrigerator, very clean. We left our car at the hotel and walked across the parking lot to Sea World. So simple! We did not get to swim in the pool but it looked very inviting. For an additional charge there was a breakfast buffet off the lobby which was delicious. You could make your own waffles or have an omelet from the omelet station, bacon, sausage, fresh fruit, yogurt, cereal, pastries, just numerous choices. We will certainly stay here again! Every staff member we encountered was as nice and helpful as possible.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice!”
Reviews.Author: ririck
Reviews.Content: Stayed here for three nights to go to Seaworld before going down to they keys. We liked it so much that we stayed for one more night on our way back home after leaving the keys. The staff is friendly and courteous, the room was very clean and comfortable. The pool was clean, enjoyable and not overly crowded. The waitstaff in the restaurant are very friendly and efficicent, the breakfast buffet was delicious. We would definately stay here again!

Reviews.Title: “Up close and personal”
Reviews.Author: BostonSoozieQ
Reviews.Content: We wanted two days at Sea World, and this hotel provides proximity to the park and a great hotel for an excellent price. By staying at this Hilton and using their shuttle, we also avoided the $11 per day parking fee at Sea World. The shuttle times were not too convenient, but the hotel is so close that we easily walked back one afternoon, and walked back again in the evening. Food at the hotel restaurant is average, but an above-average waitress made it special. One small issue... we had a room with a door ajoing another guest's room. We've had room like this before at other hotels. However here we could hear everything being said be the couple next door, as well as their tv late at night. After the first night we asked for a different room. Front desk was ver nice, and as we headed off the Sea World the told us our things would be move for us by thi time we returned. All this done with a smile! Also, for intenet use- check e-mail etc., there is a business center near the front desk that is free and open to all who are staying at the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “Housekeeping Needs A Wake Up Call”
Reviews.Author: KWJunkie
Reviews.Content: I booked this hotel on the Hilton Honors website for 6 nights beginning July 4. Room size and accomodations were fine for the four of us. TV did not work when we checked in. We reported this to the front desk on our way out to eat and it was fixed by the time we returned. At night we had a great view of the Disney fireworks from our room. My concerns are with the housekeeping staff. The decorative pillows on the bed were stained, the bed spreads had hairs on them and the sheets which were suppposed to be changed every three days were never changed during our stay. There were four towels (with one really long blonde hair) and washcloths left the first day, four towels and one washcloth left the second day, four towels and three washcloths the third day and four towels and two washcloths left on the fourth day. We started a guessing game of how many washcloths would be left each day. One towel looked filthy when it was unfolded. The room was never vacuumed (a tiny piece of paper stayed on the floor the entire length of our stay). Three years ago we stayed at the Hilton Garden Inn Universal and enjoyed our stay. Would have stayed there again but they did not have any non-smoking rooms available. I don't think I'll stay here again.

Reviews.Title: “Nice”
Reviews.Author: Rozie21
Reviews.Content: This was a nice hotel, nice bar and excellent breakfast, not expensive and great for what you get! Staff in restaurant A**** and also nice friendly bar staff, reception staff are ok but one guy never smiles. Rooms large and tidy. Maid service not the best. Walking distance to Sea World. A hike to International Drive. Pool very small but does the job. Would go back.

Reviews.Title: “GREAT Hotel!”
Reviews.Author: KrissyB
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were recently down in Florida to visit family and have some time to ourselves before our first child is born. The first two nights we "splurged" and stayed on Universal grounds, and our last two nights in Florida were spent at Hilton Garden Inn/SeaWorld. What a fantastic deal. I'm pleased to see that everyone else shares my thoughts on this hidden treasure. The pool was really nice... a big step up from most hotel pools... the staff was so nice and helpful, the rooms were CLEAN and pleasant, the beds were comfy - even the food was good! (from what we understand they recently got new chefs and kitchen staff...) To top it all off, it is walking distance to SeaWorld. We highly recommend this hotel and we look forward to going back again once our baby is old enough to enjoy SeaWorld!

Reviews.Title: “Okay for a short stay”
Reviews.Author: blueyedtravler
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very average, definitely nothing special. Pros: So close to Sea World you can walk there, bar, breakfast is available, in room microwave and fridge, close to highway, nice bedding. Cons: Pool is on the parking lot, lots of kids, a/c was very loud, breakfast is kind of expensive (we just bought groceries), dishes in the hallway from room service, etc all day, the view (parking lot and road), checkout is at 11 AM

Reviews.Title: “Very close to Sea World and Dixie Stampede”
Reviews.Author: ariesfire
Reviews.Content: This was a great place to stay. Room was very clean. Elevators were quick. The shower water pressure was wonderful. Hotel is behind the parking lot of Sea World. If you walk out of the back of the hotel, it is right across the street. Dixie Stampede is around the corner. One word of caution, I kept turning the wrong way leaving the hotel and ending up on a highway.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay...”
Reviews.Author: dlace93
Reviews.Content: Very nice hotel. Close to Sea World and other attractions. Front desk personnel very helpful. Rooms were clean and updated. Pool and hot tub very nice for kids. Breakfast was great (as are all at HGInns). Watch out for "free shuttle to parks" as they are contracted out to a separate company (they sometimes run really late and may try to charge you for the free trip). Hotel was extremely trustworthy as we left 14 DVD's in the room. A week later we contacted hotel and all DVD's had been retreived by housekeeping and returned to us.

Reviews.Title: “Overall good; but there are many choices”
Reviews.Author: techmom64
Reviews.Content: Booked through Orbitz without a choice of room-type. Ended up with 2 double beds instead of the preferred King. After checking in I asked to be moved, but the front desk could not accomodate the request for the first night. The next morning we asked at the desk and they were very helpful and moved us to a King. The beds are very comfortable and the rooms/inside lobby was clean. The hotel overall is very safe and well kept. The pool is smaller than it looks online. It is locaated in the front of the hotel so there is not much privacy from the parking lot and people entering. The location is convenient - close to I4/Disney and truely right across the street from Seaworld. The trolley is outside the door and fast and convenient. The rate was good, but there are many many many hotels along I-drive to choose from. I know you could pay $20 more per night to stay at a place with a bigger/nicer pool if that is important

Reviews.Title: “Flawless!”
Reviews.Author: OpenRoadHome
Reviews.Content: Everything about the reservation process went smoothly. I booked directly from the hotel a few months in advance, and everyone I spoke with from my first phone call to the last one before we checked in was friendly and helpful. I am employed by a company that partners with Hilton, and recieved a discounted rate, but from our stay, I would have paid any price for the room and service. Check-in was smooth. Our room was on the 6th floor and was very nice, we could see the roller coasters at SeaWorld. It was unusually cold during our stay, but the days it was warm the air conditioner worked promptly and effectively (which, during the summer anyone would be thankful for)! My husband and I are private people, so we kept the Do Not Disturb sign on the door most of the time. One morning we took the sign off the door at 11:00 and went to lunch, when we got back at 12:00 our room was cleaned and nothing of our personal effects had been touched. We did have one problem where our remote had gone missing after housekeeping had been there. When we called the front desk they had on sent up to us within 5 minutes. The location of this hotel COULD NOT BE BETTER! It was right off of International Drive, but far enough away that you couldn't hear the noise of the traffic. We bought seven day passes for Universal Studios, and the hotel staff told us a really quick back way to get there. We had a wonderful trip as a couple, and I am certain any family would have a wonderful stay at this hotel. the next time we return to Orlando, this is where we will be staying, no doubt about it!

Reviews.Title: “Good operating base for SeaWorld lovers”
Reviews.Author: gaken
Reviews.Content: I joined my wife in Orlando after she attended a business conference at a larger Hilton property there. Since we are hardcore SeaWorld fans and I qualified for a reward stay, the Hilton Garden Inn seemed the logical choice. We were overall well pleased with our room; however the walls seemed to be a bit thin -- as noise from our neighbors televison as well as people passing in the hall were very evident all night. As with some other reviews, we thought the restaurant a bit pricey. The in-room fridge and microwave came in handy, as we just picked up some basic staples at a local grocer for breakfast. The only negative taste I came away with is that there seemed to be a "bait and hook" promotion going on to attract people to time share presentations (I assume). Two messages were left on our room phone inviting us to come down for our "welcome gift" as well as some bonus Hilton Honors points. I thought better of it and decided not to respond.

Reviews.Title: “Liked the hotel a lot but not perfect”
Reviews.Author: Lucy_Europe
Reviews.Content: Booked our stay from internet travel agent for about $100 a night for total 8 nights. Hotel is right beside Seaworld, which is very nice. Also shuttle service to Universal and Disney, timetables not necessarily very good though, best if you have a car. Hotel is very clean and pool big enough, jacuzzi not working properly though. Room had a horrible view (the ceiling of part of hotel), otherwise very nice, cleaned daily except for one day. Lobby area comfortable, so is the restaurant, which was little pricey. If you have a car plenty of places to have breakfast elsewhere too, also I-Drive trolley stops right in front of the hotel. Parking area big enough, and seemed safe. Easy access to I-4. Attraction tickets sold in lobby, particularly one guy especially helpful! Hotel reception staff was far from helpful and friendly, except for maybe 1-2 employees, most did not even say hello. Still, could consider staying there again.

Reviews.Title: “I liked the place!!”
Reviews.Author: agkg645
Reviews.Content: I liked the place!! Our room was very nice. The bed was quite comfortable, plenty of pillows & nice downy comforter. It was clean & showed signs of recently being re-done. The AC worked good as well as the mico, fridge & haridryer. Plenty of thick towels and toiletries. Room was quiet. Check in & check out was prompt and problem free. Guest laundry was a little inadequate though. Did eat breakfast in the dining room a couple of times. All though a little pricey, it was adequate and filling. I would surely stay here again

Reviews.Title: “Very disappointed after our first stay at a Hilton property”
Reviews.Author: Andrea13
Reviews.Content: This hotel is temporarily under construction. We got a management letter that said, they were going to replace beddings (our bed was comfortable though a bit soft) and carpets in the room. But in our room we even had no desk nor a chair, only a sofachair. No chance to connect to the provided internet, once because there was no desk so it was really uncomfortable, second we got no connection. I talked to the lady at frontdesk in the morning and she gave us the options of changing room or she would ask the technician if it’s possible to put the desk into the room. We decided to stay and get the missing stuff. She called him, he said yes, he will fix our problems. He even promised to fix the brandnew hairdryer that was falling off the wall while it was used. When we returned late at night – nothing had changed. We had expected a lot from a Hilton as these are high standard hotels in Europe, where we come from, seems to be different in the U.S... We had to use the towel for the bathroom floor the first night as there was nothing else provided and for the 2nd night shampoo and lotion were not replaced. Our room even had no dust bin (only a tiny one in the bathroom). There was no free breakfast (would have cost 10 $ though all over in Orlando you get buffet for 3,99). Yes, we are really disappointed by Hilton but we would stay again in this hotel as I think, these problems might be only momentarily as long as they are refurbishing the place. The room itself is spacious and as promised by the management letter – exceptionally clean, we had a king bed (they did not ask us at check-in, as we had a pre-paid voucher, if this is ok, I would have prefered to have 2 q, but was too tired to change room). Big screen TV showed a lot of channels, there was a fridge and microwave in room. Coffeemachine did not work either as there was missing a part. Pot was broken. Bathroom looked new though it had some spots on the walls. Good massage showerhead and waterpressure. Lots of towels. Nice toiletries (though not replaced). Real tiles around tub. There’s a tiny closet with ironing equipment, an extra blanket, a tray for the suitcase and some hangers for the clothes. Avoid to take a room right across the ice- and vending-machines, like we had (601) as it’s terribly noisy all night with the machines running ouside! The nice pool was under construction for some more days, but it looked invitingly, though cars parked directly alongside. Lots of parking around the building is provided. Lobby is spacious, part of it is a restaurant with plenty of tables, there is a nice sitting area with comfortable sofas. Lady at front desk was helpful, though it did not work out. We paid about 70.- inclusive tax.

Reviews.Title: “peaceful hilton gardens”
Reviews.Author: destressed
Reviews.Content: My daughter and I stayed at the beginning of Sept 06. The hotel was being renovated but we were very unaware of any upset except for trying to find a laundry room open one day. Efficient but unobtrusivie staff and the hotel was spotless. Great time to visit the parks, still very hot but so much quieter, you can walk on to the rides instead of queueing all the time. Only downfall of whole visit is plagues of love bugs which seem to be worse at parks with water ie blizzard beach! Would go back in a minute and stay at same hotel, also great location on i trolley and lynx stops.

Reviews.Title: “Brilliant first time in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: Neena_alba
Reviews.Content: This hotel is great. We didn't hire a car but didn't really feel we needed to. There is a free Shuttle service to all the parks which is handy and you can walk to Sea World - out the door and hang a right its about 10 minutes away. I-Ride stop is right outside the hotel and there's a trolley every 20 minutes or so which takes you up to the main drag of International Drive. A 15 minute ride gets you to the main hub where most of the restaurants and shops are. We only used the restaurant in the hotel a couple of times but we did get room service on a regular basis (too tired to move most nights!). Food was excellent (try the ribs) and the staff making and serving it were helpful and efficient. You can also order pizza and chinese to be delivered to your room if you fancy something a bit different. Reception staff were particularly helpful offering help and advise on the best shops, things to do and organising taxis when needed. We had a fabulous stay - peace and quiet but with easy access to parks etc. Ooh and if you get a chance go to Discovery Cove and swim with Dolphins - it was the better than all the other parks put together.

Reviews.Title: “1st Anniversary in Orlando”
Reviews.Author: mlmench
Reviews.Content: My husband and I had a wonderful time in Orlando for our 1st anniversary. I chose this hotel because it was very affordable. I was pleasantly surprised when we arrived, it definitely exceeded my expectations. It is located in walking distance to SeaWorld and right off the sites of I-Drive.

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money if on a budget”
Reviews.Author: Shamu2
Reviews.Content: We stayed at Hilton Garden Inn Orlando in jul2006 for 7 nights. It is a 3star hotel with a small but adequate pool, very friendly staff. There is a small restaurant on site which was well used for breakfast but most people ate out at night and we felt that the dinner menu was a bit limited. We had to call a doctor out twice while we were there and found this a very reassuring experience. This hotel is well placed for the i-ride which stops outside the hotel and runs the complete length of International drive.It costs a dollar each time you get on or you can buy a pass to cover a few days for next to nothing. It is very close to Seaworld and we actually walked there and back on the day that we went there. We would recommend this hotel for families,couples and the older generation. We would use this hotel again

Reviews.Title: “NOT HILTON QUALITY”
Reviews.Author: globaltrek
Reviews.Content: I stay at Hiltons all the time (weekly with my job) and I must say that this hotel was NOT Hilton quality. It reminded me more of a Ramada Inn. The rooms were not very clean, items were missing from the room, the hallways were stained (carpets and walls). Our bathroom was covered in hair, and when we asked for NO housekeeping service we still received it. I must say that the hotel staff are great! (obviously not our housekeeper that day). But the front desk upon check in was great, and any encounter that i had with them during the stay was great. I contacted the manager after leavign (it was a weekend) and they were gracious enough to refund a night of my stay. They did apologize and say they would begin renovating this fall, so all in all they did come through. Give it a try - the hotel staff makes it ok, but don't expect the quality of most Hilton Honors brand hotels.

Reviews.Title: “Great location for SeaWorld/Discovery Cove”
Reviews.Author: Lisagv
Reviews.Content: We LOVED the location of this Hilton Garden Inn. You really can walk to SeaWorld from the hotel and we even had a great view of the SeaWorld fireworks from our hotel window! The hotel property itself was very nice and we also liked the area the hotel was in - newer and not as congested as some of the other parts of town. The only thing we missed was not having a free continental breakfast - but we knew that when we made the reservations and made due with some snacks we had packed and the free coffee and tea in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Not Up To Par”
Reviews.Author: icyfires
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at other Hilton Garden Inns in various cities. This one, at the Sea World Gate, did not come up to the same standards the Hilton chains are noted for. Upon arrival, there were no caddies for our luggage. We had to go hunting around the parking lot for one. Next, while unloading our luggage in the room, we found half eaten candy in the drawer next to the bed. The previous occupant left a shoe under the bed and it was obvious the room had not been cleaned (especially under the beds) to the standards I've become accustomed to in a Hilton hotel. The bathroom floor needed a scrubbing, and the toilet paper rolls were almost empty. Normally, I leave a tip for housekeeping upon check out, but in this case I did not. At the pool, there were no towels. The container for the soiled towels was full and no one came to replace them with clean towels. We were at the pool for two hours and there surely was ample time for someone in housekeeping to check this out. The spa was not working (temperature problems) and we asked about this. The hotel employee thought it very funny and told us it would be fixed "whenever". The restaurant had a very good breakfast buffet but the lunch and dinner menu was lacking and the dinner we ate at the hotel was overpriced and the food mediocre. Upon check out, we had to go hunting for a luggage caddy again. When we asked at the front desk the desk clerk said to look around, and we circled the parking lot twice until we found one. This hotel was a disappointment and I doubt I will stay at this Hilton Garden Inn again. Orlando has hundreds of hotels and I think to keep up with competition, this hotel should make an effort to live up to the Hilton name.

Reviews.Title: “Good value & location”
Reviews.Author: jacklin
Reviews.Content: We have just stayed in this hotel from march 5-11 for £360 and thought it was good value. Only a 10 minute walk from sea world and free shuttles to disney & universal. In regards to the person who complained about the carpets i did not think they were any worse than most hotels we stay at and at these prices you wont get perfect carpets.

Reviews.Title: “ok”
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
Reviews.Content: room was clean, bed was good. room had refrigerator and coffee as well as bottled water. i wanted a decent room for the extra dollars i spent ($109 / nght) and they delivered. it wasnt luxury accomodations but good. fitness room ok, pool cold, spa warm, computer with internet and printer available, plenty of hot shower water with decent showerhead, tap water had chemical taste. good location. further advise, orlando in general seemed to try to get every dime they could out of the tourists with prices, fees, taxes and tolls; fly in elsewhere, drive to attractions and leave.

HotelInfo.Name: Hilton Garden Inn Orlando at SeaWorld
HotelInfo.Address: 6850 Westwood Boulevard, Orlando, FL 32821
